alert.note: Alert for Brunswick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 3:00PM EST until December 28 at 11:50PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia... Meherrin River At Lawrenceville affecting Brunswick County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 10 pm this evening. late tonight at midnight EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...The Meherrin River near Lawrenceville was creating around 16 feet this afternoon and evening. Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Meherrin River at Lawrenceville. * WHEN...Minor flooding is expected to continue tonight. The river will fall below flood stage Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Pasture land north of the river, downstream of the gage, begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 16.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 PM EST Thursday was 16.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tonight and continue falling to 3.6 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.0 feet on 12/30/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
